This is a global movement for open, inclusive, and actionable data-driven environmental research. We’re excited to connect.


JOIN THE MOVEMENT

  • Reuse our open lessons, slides, and more linked from our media and github: @openscapes, @nasa-openscapes
  • Follow us on social media: @openscapes@fosstodon.org on Mastodon
  • Sign up for our newsletter mailing list (4x/year)
  • Join an upcoming event, including Openscapes initiatives, community calls, and talks
  • Talk to your colleagues; consider Supercharge your research for your next journal club or lab meeting


WORK WITH US

Please email us if you’re interested in booking cohorts, partnering with us, sponsoring our initiatives, or sharing your wild ideas.


Contract Opportunity: NASA Openscapes Cloud Team Member

January 26, 2024. Applications are now closed for the NASA Openscapes Cloud Team Member. We received 26 applications for this role and will be planning our interview rounds in the coming weeks. Thank you for your interest.


UPCOMING EVENTS

Openscapes holds regular community calls, participates in conference talks, webinars, and organizes opportunities through the Champions Program and other initiatives. Browse our events listings and register to attend!
